summary: This is a letter motion from the U.S. Attorney's Office in the case U.S. v. Maxwell, referencing proposed redactions to a document. It appears to be procedural correspondence between the prosecution and the court regarding the handling of sensitive case materials.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The person who submitted the letter motion and attachments to the court chambers.

events.title: Government files letter motion in Maxwell case
events.description: The Government filed a letter motion (Dkt. No. 455) along with proposed redactions for a document.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a procedural filing in the case U.S. v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The Government submitted a letter motion (Dkt. No. 455) on November 12, 2021.
The filing includes both an unredacted copy and a version with proposed redactions.
The correspondence is from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
